Urban Chinatown

About Data Collection + Mapping Precedent Studies Contact

About

URBAN Living Chinatown Vancouver was initiated by Inge Roecker for a UBC SALA Vertical Studio in Spring 2015. Our goal with this site was to expose our reseach to the public, by making it clear and easy to access.
